content.question: In the tenth paragraph, the author appeals twice to “our values” in order to

choices.label: claim that her family’s experiences run counter to shared national ideals
dispel doubts surrounding her own status as an American citizen
suggest that her audience’s values might differ from those of her parents
distinguish between groups who have adopted similar values for different reasons

content.answer: claim that her family’s experiences run counter to shared national ideals

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
